newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Hambrecht ups two software cos.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Hambrecht ups two software cos.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist analyst Christopher Galvin said he upgraded CyberMedia Inc, a utility software maker, and Legato Systems Inc, which supplies network storage management software, to strong buy from buy.
-- The analyst said he believed near-term product demand for CyberMedia has been strong and it is poised for a "great" December quarter earnings report.
-- He said concerns arising from changes in the competitive landscape for Legato have been overblown.
-- Galvin said Legato is poised for a "strong" December report and a "great" two years as one of the leaders in network storage management software.
